H0.text: In medicine the MMR vaccination gives protection against which diseases. Meningitis, Mononucleosis, and Rabies

H1.text: In medicine the MMR vaccination gives protection against which diseases. Influenza, Hepatitis, and Rotavirus

H2.text: In medicine the MMR vaccination gives protection against which diseases. Chickenpox, Shingles, and Pertussis

H3.text: In medicine the MMR vaccination gives protection against which diseases. Measles, Mumps and Rubella

A4.text: The MMR vaccine is a combination vaccine against measles, mumps, and rubella (German measles).

A5.text: The MMR vaccine is a mixture of live weakened viruses of the three diseases.
